items.plugins.title: Installed Plugins
items.plugins.confirm_uninstall_message: Are you sure you want to uninstall "{0}"? This action cannot be undone.

items.protocols.subtitle: Manage default applications for special protocols
items.language.title: Language Settings
items.language.subtitle: Configure system and plugin languages
items.language.system_desc: Set the default language for Phobos
items.language.restart_required: Some changes may require a restart to take effect
items.permissions.title: Permission Settings
items.permissions.subtitle: Manage plugin permissions and trust settings
items.permissions.trusted_desc: Trusted plugins have all permissions granted automatically
items.permissions.system_plugin_desc: System plugins have certain permissions by default that cannot be modified
items.permissions.confirm_trust_message: Are you sure you want to trust "{0}"? This will grant all permissions to this plugin.
items.permissions.confirm_revoke_trust_message: Are you sure you want to revoke trust from "{0}"? The plugin will need to request permissions again.
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_NOTIFICATIO: Allow plugin to send system notifications
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_AUTOSTART.d: Allow plugin to register as a startup item
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_LINKSTART.d: Allow plugin to register protocol associations
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_READ_SYS.de: Allow plugin to read system configuration
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_WRITE_SYS.d: Allow plugin to modify system configuration
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_PLUGINSETTI: Allow plugin to read other plugins' settings
Allow plugin to modify other plugins' settings
items.permission.PHOBOS_PERMISSION_DESKTOPITEM: Allow plugin to access desktop items
